full_description:
Job Title – Mid level Data Analyst
Location – Philadelphia, PA
Position – Contract
Rate – ($Best possible)
We are looking for a passionate certified Data Analyst. The successful candidate will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. Data analyst responsibilities include conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, activities and design. Data analysts will develop analysis and reporting capabilities. They will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.
Requirements:
\n
\n
Hands-on experience with data loading tools (MXLoader preferred)
\n
Hands-on experience loading data in an asset intensive organization
\n
Understands Master Data Management concepts
\n
SQL Experience
\n
Experience with major RDBMS: DB2, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MS SQL, Sybase
\n
Experience of Scrum methodology
\n
Experience building asset based data models in Excel
\n
First class stakeholder management
\n
Nice-to-haves:
\n
\n
Experience using project collaboration tools (Atlassian: JIRA & Confluence, Slack, Teams, etc)
\n
Data engineering experience with a major Rail organization
\n
